name: SilentGlissMove40
0:
”Alexa, turn on Movie Night.”
”Alexa, set Kitchen Lights to 50 percent.”
”Alexa, dim Living Room Lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Silent Gliss knows that sometimes you need a third hand!

Move 4.0 for Amazon Alexa makes your smart appliances even more convenient to use and your home more comfortable, friendly and accessible.

Move 4.0 skill for Amazon Alexa will help you control lights, blinds/shutters, gates, scenes and even more without even lifting a finger. You won’t need to find your phone, go to wall switches, or even use remote controls - just ask Alexa.

"Alexa, activate Movie Night scene."
"Alexa, set the kitchen lights to 50%."

To control the Silent Gliss Move 4 smart home ecosystem with Alexa you would need:
•  A Silent Gliss hub, with firmware version 5.180 or newer
•  A Move-ID account associated with your gateway (it is an account that enables you to use all Silent Gliss services with one profile)
•  An Amazon Alexa device

To find out more about the Silent Gliss Move 4 ecosystem here’s the dedicated website: https://www.silentgliss.com/file/?file=Manual_SG11900.pdf
